title: Software Development Services | Freshcode
keywords: web development services, mobile development services, technology
description: Software, web and mobile development services provided by Frescode: mobile, web and desktop development and technology consulting.
page-text: Below are our areas of expertise. These are the business dimensions where we collaborate with our clients and help them build great products. Choose those that fit your needs most to learn more.
alt: Tablet and a cup of coffee on a table

short.name: Web development
short.text: We create responsive, fast and elegant solutions expertly crafted to suit your business needs using the most efficient technologies like Ruby on Rails, Angular.js, Node.js.

short.name: Mobile development
short.text: We implement workable solutions for both iOS and Android operation systems and help you build a balanced app with a streamlined design, intuitive interface, and top-notch performance.

short.name: Desktop development
short.text: We provide a stable architecture to fulfill your business needs. We ensure application's rich functionality, user-friendliness, high productivity and guarantee seamless synchronization and integration.

short.name: Maintenance
short.text: We perform regular maintenance to prevent system's instability. Our fool-proof backup and recovery options minimize risks of unexpected failures and maximize project's uptime.

short.name: Consulting
short.text: We estimate the time and resources needed, plan the work and choose the best technologies and solutions for your needs. We provide usability analysis, architecture stability, code and UX audits.

short.name: Dedicated team
short.text: We create a dedicated team for your high priority projects. Each team member boasts specialization and skill set best fitted for your needs to ensure successful and timely development.
